## Install and load aquamonitR

aquamonitR is installed in niva_datasci_toolkit, and can be loaded directly.

```{r}
library(aquamonitR)
```

The main purpose of this library would be to query for PTI and water chemistry data from Nivadatabase.

## Connect to AquaMonitor
```{r}
token <- login()
```
